column2: Procter & Gamble
Chemical Assessment Questionnaire
Procter and Gamble is either currently using, or considering purchasing a material manufactured by your company or a material made using your material.  To be eligible as an approved
supplier for this material our safety and regulatory assessment program requires the completion of the enclosed questionniare(s).  Your cooperation is highly appreciated.
Supplier confirms that they have been duly diligent in confirming that all information given with and within this document are correct and true,
and will not be changed without first informing Procter and Gamble.  Any change in any of the below information will be brought to the attention of Procter and Gamble immediately.
Manufacturer Name
Material Trade Name/Material Product Code
Document Version # and Date of Completion
Enter supplier's name, address, location and contact who certifies this document
Is this material being manufactured in multiple sites?
column5: Is the information provided in this questionniare applicable to all manufacturing sites?
column9: If NO, please note that you will need to provide one questionnaire for each manufacturing site that provides this material to P&G

column9: Specify Feedstock if plant or animal derived
column12: Does supplier agree to meet the specification levels indicated in the two previous columns (if indicated by P&G).  Enter Yes/No and if No Explain.
